function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Mobility behavior changes due to subjective levels of safety and mental comfort","Impact":"Avoidance of public transport, leading to increased private vehicle use and potential congestion","Mitigation":"Implement measures to increase safety and comfort in public transport, provide alternative transportation options, and promote sustainable mobility","Technologies":"Smart transportation systems, real-time crowd monitoring, contactless payment systems","People":"Public transport users, decision-makers, urban planners","Owner":"Transport authorities, government, urban planning agencies"},{"Description":"Restrictions and limitations on mobility and social activities","Impact":"Reduced mobility, economic impact, social isolation","Mitigation":"Gradual easing of restrictions, promotion of safe mobility practices, support for affected industries and communities","Technologies":"Real-time data analysis, contact tracing apps, vaccination and testing technologies","People":"General population, businesses, social groups","Owner":"Government, public health agencies, economic and social support organizations"},{"Description":"Local responses to a global pandemic","Impact":"Differences in effectiveness of pandemic response, potential for cross-border transmission","Mitigation":"International cooperation, information sharing, standardized health and safety protocols","Technologies":"Global health data analytics, communication platforms, remote collaboration tools","People":"Global population, health authorities, policymakers","Owner":"International health organizations, governments, intergovernmental agencies"}]}
